Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

Fall (2021)

Delivered one total tackle (one ast.) in a contest vs. Stony Brook (Oct. 23)

Posted one pass breakup and one quarterback hurry in match up vs Elon. (Oct 8)

Tallied one total tackle (one solo) vs. Virginia Tech (Sept. 25)

Recorded five total tackle (one solo, four ast.), including a half tackle for loss. (Villanova (Sept 18).

Created one total tackle (one ast.) in a win over Lehigh (Sept. 11)

Notched two total tackles (one solo, one ast.) in a win over Howard (Sept. 4)

2020-21 (Spring)

Started all four games in the spring.

Recorded five tackles.

2019

Played in all 12 games, making seven starts in the hybrid linebacker role.

Recorded 37 tackles on the season, 18 solo and 19 assisted.

Posted a career-high eight tackles against William & Mary (Nov. 23) and added seven tackles against Yale (Oct. 19).

Forced a fumble against Stony Brook (Nov. 2).

Recorded 5.0 tackles for loss on the year, posting 1.0 TFL against Jacksonville (Aug. 29), Yale, James Madison (Nov. 16) and William & Mary.

Tallied three pass breakups, including two against Yale.

2018

Appeared in four games during his freshman season to earn a redshirt.

High School

Earned All-Conference accolades during his final two seasons

Also played QB on the offensive side of the ball

Earned All-Conference accolades in track as well
